text: Github Issues: Issue Branch Title (Applies to all profiles) ‘Advanced settings for the name of the branch that is created when you start working on an issue. ㅇ suser} wil be replace with the currently logged in usemame ㅇ Sissuetumber} will be replaced with the current issue number ㅇ ${sanitizedrssueritie) will be replaced with the issue title, with all spaces and unsupported characters (httpsy/git-scm.com/docs/git-check-ref-format) removed Susen)/issueSfissueNumbery/S{sanitizedissueTitie}
